info.name: Shinigami
info.description: Spiritual warriors who maintain the balance between life and death.
info.author: Cynful Studio

description.p: Shinigami, or Soul Reapers, are spiritual beings who maintain the balance of souls between the mortal world and the afterlife. They wield Zanpakutō, blades that embody their very soul, and protect mortals from Hollows—corrupted spirits that devour souls.
Each Shinigami possesses a unique Zanpakutō and spiritual energy, known as Reiatsu. This energy fuels their combat prowess, abilities, and movement through the worlds of the living and the dead.

Ability Score Increase.Your Wisdom score increases by 2, and your Dexterity score increases by 1.
Age.Shinigami mature at the same rate as humans but can live for centuries due to their spiritual essence.
Alignment.Shinigami value order and duty, tending toward lawful alignments, though individuality varies by division.
Size.Shinigami are similar in build to humans. Your size is Medium.
Speed.Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
Languages.You can speak, read, and write Common and Spiritual Tongue.

Spiritual Awareness.You can sense spiritual entities. You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks to detect ethereal or undead creatures.
Reiatsu Control.Once per long rest, as a bonus action, you can empower your attacks with spiritual energy. For 1 minute, you add your proficiency bonus to attack and damage rolls.
Soul Form.As an action, you can separate from your physical body (if applicable), entering a spirit state for up to 10 minutes. In this state, you can pass through non-magical barriers and see into the Ethereal Plane. You cannot interact with solid matter. Once per long rest.
Zanpakutō Affinity.You gain proficiency with longswords, which serve as your Zanpakutō. When wielding your Zanpakutō, you may use Wisdom instead of Strength or Dexterity for attack and damage rolls.
You can sense spirits and invisible entities. You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks to detect ethereal or undead creatures.
